description: I used the Strait-Flex Big Stick with thin-set on the KERDI-BOARD and drywall. This can be waterproofed using KERDI-BAND, although it's outside the shower in this instance. Remember, you can unlock all our full tutorials inside our Platinum Membership at homrepairtutor.com
title: How to Finish Shower Wall Outside Corner - #shorts #homerepairtutor
